name: Magical Musketeer Kidbrave
text: You can activate "Magibullet" Spells/ Traps from your hand during either player's turn. If a Spell/Trap is activated in the same column as this card: You can discard 1 "Magibullet" card; draw 2 cards. You can only use this effect of "Magibullet Shooter The Kid" once per turn.
